general.title: The Sitting Down like a girl.
general.description: Randomly crouch every 5 seconds to confuse your opponent.

general.title: The Dr.Disrespectyourwife
general.description: Use taunts or ki charge after every successful hit.

general.title: The Door Stuck
general.description: You are not allowed to use directional Inputs, you may use directional inputs only for moves like ewgf etc.

general.title: The 'I'm on the shitter'
general.description: Spam your Full Crouch moves only.

general.title: The Hot ones
general.description: Eat the spiciest thing that you have and finish the match without drinking anything.

general.title: The Switcheroo
general.description: Switch your Playside and leave it that way for the entire set. You can mark this as complete after accepting a match.

general.title: The ShinBlade
general.description: Win the match and use taunts or ki charge after every combo tornado.

general.title: The Annoying little shit
general.description: Try to win using only low kicks.

general.title: The sus one.
general.description: Make weird sounds while performing combos.

general.title: The good ol switcheroo.
general.description: Switch your grip on the controller every round.

general.title: The MishimaComplex.
general.description: You're an aussie now so when your opponents health is low you may only spam low moves or throw random rage art.

general.title: The Stevie Wonder.
general.description: Play with your eyes closed.

general.title: The MK player.
general.description: Jump every 3 seconds. You may use airborne attacks.

general.title: The Irish lad.
general.description: Only use punches and drink whatever beverage you have. You may only combo after a drink.

general.title: The Pewdiepie.
general.description: Pretend you're playing another game and commentate your moves. You may only combo after saying 'subscribe to Pewdiepie' or giving your cam a brofist.

general.title: The DDR connoisseur.
general.description: Perform a dance move after every combo.

general.title: The 3D Gamer.
general.description: Use the sidestep excessively to look fancy.

general.title: The Kakashi the Copycat.
general.description: Try to mimic your opponent's moves as much as possible.

general.title: The Vertical Gamer.
general.description: Play one round standing up.

general.title: The 'I Played Tekken 3' Phenomenon.
general.description: Perform random button presses and act as if you knew that it works.

general.title: The Mastered Ultra Instinct.
general.description: You mastered Ultra Instinct, now show it off. Dodge everything. Literally everything.

general.title: The Inverted Insanity.
general.description: Play one round with your controller upside down.

general.title: The One and Doner.
general.description: Land a combo and then walk away from the screen. You may only come back after 10 seconds.

general.title: The Twin Ten-Hit Tsunami.
general.description: Land 2 10 hit combos in a row.

general.title: The Self-Hype Supreme.
general.description: Cheer yourself on loudly after each successful move.

general.title: The King.
general.description: Only use throws for an entire round.

general.title: The Flacid Snake.
general.description: Pretend your character is on a stealth mission; only use crouching moves.

general.title: The Actor.
general.description: React to each hit as if it’s the most epic thing ever.

general.title: The Liar.
general.description: Make up nicknames for each of your moves and announce them loudly.

general.title: The Jesus.
general.description: Pretend you're a pacifist and only use defensive moves.

general.title: The Professional.
general.description: You're a pro only poking no combos.

general.title: The Keep Yourself Safe.
general.description: Use only your character's weakest moves.

general.title: The 'Did I Just Do That?' Strategy.
general.description: After every successful hit, pause for a second as if you’re shocked it landed.

general.title: The Pain Before Gain.
general.description: You may only attack back after being hit and win the match. Block counts.

general.title: The 'this isn't my Final Form'.
general.description: Wait until your health is at least 50% then start fightning back. Win the match.

general.title: The Downloader.
general.description: Dodge every attack until the timer reaches 20sec then start attacking.

general.title: The Salt in the wound lubricator.
general.description: Ki charge after every round and then DM your opponent 'GG'. Bonus points if you get em to block you.

general.title: The Frame Perfect Punisher.
general.description: 10 frame punishers only.

general.title: The fool me thrice.
general.description: Land 3 unblockables.

general.title: The Opening Gambit.
general.description: Start the round with a unblockable.

general.title: The are you amused?
general.description: Let your chat decide which one of the four attack buttons stays and unbind the rest.

general.title: The not a Pussy.
general.description: Unbind the back button we don't block spam around here. If the side switches tough luck.

general.title: The Combo Grab
general.description: For those who can, end every combo with a grab. Style points for attempts, even if it misses.

general.title: The No mixup mixup
general.description: Keep spamming the same move over and over again. You may bait and whiff or cancel other moves.

general.title: The itchy butthole.
general.description: Play with one hand behind your back.

kazuya.title: The Spin Moves Only.
kazuya.description: Only use moves that involve spinning.

kazuya.title: The Devil Growl.
kazuya.description: Pretend to be a devil and growl every time you hit.

kazuya.title: The Last Meal.
kazuya.description: Only use moves with electric effects.

kazuya.title: The Defensive Mode.
kazuya.description: Switch to defensive mode after every hit.

kazuya.title: The Forward Dash Start.
kazuya.description: Start the round with a forward dash.

kazuya.title: The Maniacal Laugh.
kazuya.description: Laugh maniacally after every successful hit.

kazuya.title: The Devil Power Charge.
kazuya.description: Yes ki charge mixups only baby.

jin.title: The Jump Kick Start.
jin.description: Start every round with a jump kick.

jin.title: The Parry Success.
jin.description: Perform a parry after every successful hit.

jin.title: The Stance Moves.
jin.description: Only use moves from his stances.

jin.title: The Electric Pressure.
jin.description: Use Electric Wind Hook Fist repeatedly to pressure your opponent.

jin.title: The Parry Attack.
jin.description: You're only allowed to attack after parrying an attack.

devil jin.title: The AH-64 Apache Helicopter.
devil jin.description: Use only moves that involve flying.

devil jin.title: The 'Hug It Out' Victory Grab.
devil jin.description: End the round with the unbreakable grab.

devil jin.title: The Masood.
devil jin.description: Sansara only. You may combo from it.

devil jin.title: The Wings actually work?
devil jin.description: Attacks from his fly stance only.

devil jin.title: The Floor is lava.
devil jin.description: Fly around the stage as much as possible.

devil jin.title: The Beam Bamboozle.
devil jin.description: Keep your opponent guessing with his laser mix-ups.

Reina.title: The Grab 'Em by the Combo.
Reina.description: End the round with the unbreakable grab.

Reina.title: The Knee Deep in Salt.
Reina.description: Spam EWGK until you land a counter hit combo.

Reina.title: The Fabian's Nightmares.
Reina.description: You’re not allowed to use FC df4 and b4. Fuck you Fabian.

Reina.title: The Weeb Warrior.
Reina.description: Sentai moves only. You may use moves that lead into Sentai.

Reina.title: The 'She won't do it again'.
Reina.description: Hellsweep? Hellsweep, spam hellsweeps the whole round.

paul.title: The Fist Her First Fury.
paul.description: Always start the round with a Phoenix Smasher (Death Fist).

paul.title: The Somersault Showoff Shenanigans.
paul.description: Perform an Incomplete Somersault (FC+d uf4) after every successful Combo.

paul.title: The Biker Gang Bang.
paul.description: Pretend you're a biker and rev up between hits.

paul.title: The Risky AF Moves.
paul.description: Only use high-risk, high-reward moves and win the match.

paul.title: The Knockdown Nazi.
paul.description: Only use moves that can knock down the opponent.

paul.title: The Demo Man Domination.
paul.description: Demolition Man only. Mix in Burning Fist to keep your opponent guessing.

paul.title: The Bait and Smash Bros.
paul.description: Use his sway back to bait your opponent into attacking.

paul.title: The Punishment Porn.
paul.description: Spam his Ultimate Punishment to finish rounds.

paul.title: The Dr.Zoidberg.
paul.description: You may only move with his crabwalk(sway into ss cancel).

ling.title: The Flippin' Ninja.
ling.description: Start the round with a flip.

ling.title: The Acro Addict.
ling.description: Only use moves that involve acrobatics.

ling.title: The Movement Methhead.
ling.description: Try to confuse your opponent with constant movement.

ling.title: The Cartwheel IRL.
ling.description: End every combo with a cartwheel. Yes, real life.

ling.title: The Surprise Muthaf*cka.
ling.description: Act as if every hit is a surprise.

ling.title: The Xiaoyu Yell.
ling.description: Shout 'Xiaoyu is not broken!' with every successful hit.

ling.title: The Phoenix Flex.
ling.description: Use Art of Phoenix stance repeatedly.

ling.title: The Taunt Troll.
ling.description: Spam Ling's taunt after each combo.

hwoarang.title: The Flashy AF Finisher.
hwoarang.description: End every combo with a flashy move.

hwoarang.title: The Spin Kick Start.
hwoarang.description: Start the round with a spin kick.

hwoarang.title: The Cool AF Moves.
hwoarang.description: Only use moves that look cool.

hwoarang.title: The I'm a Mishima too.
hwoarang.description: You may only move around with his wave dash.

hwoarang.title: The Taekwondo Twerk.
hwoarang.description: Do a mock taekwondo routine IRL between rounds.

king.title: The I'm a Mishima too Wavu Wavu Wavu.
king.description: You may only move around using Wave Dash.

king.title: The Moonsault Madness.
king.description: End every combo with a Moonsault Body Press (BT 1+4).

king.title: The Luchador Legend.
king.description: Pretend to be a luchador and shout 'King!' with every throw.

king.title: The Ki Charge Chaos.
king.description: Perform a ki charge after every successful chain throw.

king.title: The WrestleMania.
king.description: Pretend you're in a wrestling match and commentate your moves.

king.title: The Muscle Flex Fiesta.
king.description: Flex your muscles between IRL between combos.

king.title: The People's Elbow.
king.description: End every combo with a ground throw (d+1+4 or d+2+3).

king.title: The Royal Rumble.
king.description: Use a different throw every time until you run out(You may not use the same throw even if it gets broken). Then start over.

lili.title: The Ballerina Beatdown.
lili.description: Pretend you're a ballerina after every attack.

lili.title: The Dance of Death.
lili.description: Use evasive maneuvers to dance around your opponent.

lili.title: The Curtsey Crush.
lili.description: Start each round with a curtsey.

lili.title: The Spin to Win.
lili.description: Only use moves that involve spinning.

lili.title: The Dance Break.
lili.description: Do a quick dance routine between rounds.

lili.title: The Self-Love Shoutout.
lili.description: Compliment yourself loudly after each successful move.

lili.title: The Elegant Exclamation.
lili.description: Comment on your elegance with each attack.

lili.title: The Pillow Kiss.
lili.description: Kiss your Asuka body pillow after each combo. PhiDx is lying he has one.

lili.title: The Briddish lad.
lili.description: Sip some Tea after each combo. If you don't have tea go prepare some right now.

bryan.title: The I was an adventurer.
bryan.description: Only use moves that involve his knees.

bryan.title: The Taunt Confirm.
bryan.description: Use only confirmable attacks from his taunt.

bryan.title: The Taunt Jet Starter.
bryan.description: Start the round with a taunt jet upper.

bryan.title: The Brutal Beatdown.
bryan.description: Only use moves that look brutal.

bryan.title: The Knockdown King.
bryan.description: Only use moves that end in a knockdown.

bryan.title: The Calculating Psycho.
bryan.description: Pretend to be calculating your opponent's moves.

bryan.title: The Snake Edge Special.
bryan.description: Snake Edge? Snake Edge only. You can use taunt snake edge too.

bryan.title: The Elbow Enforcer.
bryan.description: Only use moves that involve his elbows.

bryan.title: The Taunt Trap.
bryan.description: Use his taunt to bait your opponent.

bryan.title: The Orbital Overload.
bryan.description: Spam Orbital Heel to catch your opponent off guard.

bryan.title: The Mach Kick Mixer.
bryan.description: Incorporate Mach Kick into your combos.

bryan.title: The 'He won't do it again'.
bryan.description: Use Hatchet Kick and only Hatchet Kicks.

bryan.title: The Fisherman's Finale.
bryan.description: End every combo with Fisherman's Slam.

bryan.title: The Taunt Tango.
bryan.description: Keep your opponent guessing with constant taunt cancels.

bryan.title: The Elbow Opener.
bryan.description: Use Chopping Elbow to start combos.

bryan.title: The Power Crush Pummel.
bryan.description: Incorporate his power crush moves to absorb hits and counter.

yoshimitsu.title: The Teleport Troll.
yoshimitsu.description: Start each round with a teleport.

yoshimitsu.title: The Suicide Squad.
yoshimitsu.description: Use Suicide moves to intimidate your opponent.

yoshimitsu.title: The Spin Doctor.
yoshimitsu.description: Only use moves that involve spinning.

yoshimitsu.title: The Healer's Confusion.
yoshimitsu.description: Heal yourself whenever possible to confuse your opponent.

yoshimitsu.title: The Flash Start.
yoshimitsu.description: You're only allowed to use Flash to start a combo.

yoshimitsu.title: The Samurai Showdown.
yoshimitsu.description: Pretend to be a samurai and bow before each attack.

yoshimitsu.title: The Disappearing Act.
yoshimitsu.description: Only use moves that make you disappear.

yoshimitsu.title: The Spin Cycle.
yoshimitsu.description: Spin around excessively with his Spinning Sword moves.

yoshimitsu.title: The Pogo Prowler.
yoshimitsu.description: Use his pogo stance and hop around the stage.

yoshimitsu.title: The Sword Spinner.
yoshimitsu.description: Mix in Sword Spin moves frequently to create unpredictability.

yoshimitsu.title: The Flea Flicker.
yoshimitsu.description: Use Flea Stance to dodge and counter your opponent's attacks.

yoshimitsu.title: The Flea to Kincho.
yoshimitsu.description: Perform the Flea to Kincho stance transition repeatedly.

yoshimitsu.title: The Helicopter Helicopter.
yoshimitsu.description: Utilize Manji Dragonfly stance to stay airborne and unpredictable.

yoshimitsu.title: The Uh Oh Stinky.
yoshimitsu.description: You may only use Poison Breath to start a combo.

yoshimitsu.title: The Kincho Combo.
yoshimitsu.description: Incorporate his Kincho stance into your combos for mix-ups.

yoshimitsu.title: The Stance Switcher.
yoshimitsu.description: Switch between Flea and Kincho stances to confuse your opponent.

yoshimitsu.title: The Sword Sweeper.
yoshimitsu.description: Use Sword Sweep and Sword Uppercut to keep your opponent on their toes.

jack-8.title: The Mechanical Menace.
jack-8.description: Pretend you're a robot and make mechanical sounds with each move.

jack-8.title: The Heavy Hitter.
jack-8.description: Only use moves that involve heavy hits.

jack-8.title: The System Overload.
jack-8.description: Announce 'System Overload' after every combo and drop it.

jack-8.title: The Debugger Dominance.
jack-8.description: Use only Debugger for an entire round.

jack-8.title: The Armor Assault.
jack-8.description: Rely heavily on Jack-8's armor moves to power through attacks.

jack-8.title: The Charge Spam.
jack-8.description: Spam Jack-8's charge moves until they land.

jack-8.title: The Rocket Finisher.
jack-8.description: End every combo with a rocket punch.

jack-8.title: The Mix-Up Master.
jack-8.description: Mix up Jack-8's mid and low attacks to confuse your opponent.No highs allowed.

jack-8.title: The Belly Flop Finisher.
jack-8.description: Use Jack-8's belly flop to finish the round.
